channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: 2023 年，全球企业分红将达到 1.66 万亿美元，创历史新高，其中银行分红将占增长额的一半。更多信息
item.description:
Corporate dividends globally hit an all-time high of $1.66 trillion in 2023, with record payouts by banks making up half of the growth. More here https://t.co/kpe7li76cu pic.twitter.com/w7X6QBJNPz

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 美国住宅建筑商 Lennar 因房屋交付量增加，第一季度利润超出预期
item.description:
US homebuilder Lennar beats Q1 profit estimates on higher home deliveries https://t.co/RWWCIMYNHv pic.twitter.com/zWudf8grWu

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 观看：大众汽车预计今年汽车销量将放缓。德国汽车巨头预计销量将增长 3%，较 2023 年大幅下降
item.description:
WATCH: Volkswagen expects car sales to slow down this year. The German auto giant sees a 3% rise in sales, down sharply from 2023 https://t.co/dOQSJX4lRx pic.twitter.com/pgr6rm3nTq

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 高盛将恢复对美国房地产的押注，其他投资者警告将面临更多痛苦
item.description:
Goldman Sachs to resume bets on US property, other investors warn of more pain https://t.co/aiYKo1bqva pic.twitter.com/z0SFWHKBNH

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 观看：美国众议院以压倒性多数通过一项法案，要求 TikTok 的中国所有者字节跳动在六个月内剥离该短视频应用程序在美国的资产，否则将面临禁令。
item.description:
WATCH: The US House of Representatives overwhelmingly passed a bill that would give TikTok's Chinese owner ByteDance about six months to divest the US assets of the short-video app, or face a ban https://t.co/6vUxMCBHVD pic.twitter.com/p0aw5n1jXZ

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 观看：根据国际能源机构的一份新报告，尽管石油和天然气行业承诺堵塞泄漏的基础设施，但能源行业的甲烷排放量在2023年仍接近历史最高水平。
item.description:
WATCH: Methane emissions from the energy sector remained near a record high in 2023 despite a raft of commitments from the oil and gas industry to plug leaking infrastructure, according to a new report by the International Energy Agency https://t.co/g8BGCFlhZy pic.twitter.com/433Y8GbCjV

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 观看：Zara的所有者Inditex公司表示，上半年春季销售额增长了11%。这意味着这家西班牙时装巨头在与主要竞争对手 H&M 的竞争中继续获胜。
item.description:
WATCH: Inditex sales jumped 11% during the first half of the spring season, the Zara-owner said. It means the Spanish fashion giant continued its winning run against key rival H&M https://t.co/CbYN5RHeZt pic.twitter.com/uVfHSm1IhX

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: AT&T 同意从西方石油公司的 1PointFive 购买碳信用额度
item.description:
AT&T agrees to purchase carbon credits from Occidental's 1PointFive https://t.co/m3XwfvtMb3 pic.twitter.com/t4KYf7jdTK

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 法国法院裁定 Adecco 犯有种族貌相和歧视罪

item.title: 观看：阿迪达斯 30 多年来首次出现年度亏损。这家德国体育用品巨头的亏损额略高于 6,300 万美元。首席执行官比约恩-古尔登（Bjorn Gulden）正在处理与坎耶-维斯特（Kanye West）断绝关系所带来的影响。
item.description:
WATCH: Adidas posted its first annual loss in more than 30 years. The German sportswear giant lost just over $63 million. CEO Bjorn Gulden is dealing with the fallout from breaking ties with Kanye West https://t.co/dgxN52a8UP pic.twitter.com/snnipFZoxv

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 观看：在经济前景黯淡、竞争日益激烈的情况下，大众汽车预计今年的汽车销量将比2023年大幅下降3%。
item.description:
WATCH: Volkswagen expects a 3% rise in its car sales this year, down sharply from 2023 amid a gloomy economic outlook and growing competition https://t.co/dOQSJX3O1Z pic.twitter.com/g0WjJCvTwJ

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 观看：香港旗舰航空公司国泰航空表示，2023年净利润达到12.5亿美元，公司受益于停航后需求激增，四年来首次实现年度盈利。
item.description:
WATCH: Hong Kong's flagship airline Cathay Pacific said its net profit hit $1.25 billion in 2023 and the company benefited from a surge in demand following the end of lockdowns, as the airline posted its first annual profit in four years https://t.co/kg4CeJ77B3 pic.twitter.com/EDDkoM3OTw

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 观看：丰田汽车、松下电器、新日本制铁和日产汽车同意在年度工资谈判中完全满足工会的加薪要求，这让人们更加期待日本央行下周将准备好做出关键的政策调整
item.description:
WATCH: Toyota, Panasonic, Nippon Steel and Nissan have agreed to fully meet union demands for pay hikes at annual wage negotiations, raising expectations that the BOJ will feel ready to make a key policy shift next week https://t.co/xGGPMWrPFV pic.twitter.com/rAq8pDuRGc

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 看西班牙时尚巨头 Zara 的所有者 Inditex 表示，在 2 月 1 日至 3 月 11 日的上半年春季销售季中，按固定汇率计算，其销售额增长了 11%，超过了主要竞争对手 H&M 的年销售额增长率。
item.description:
WATCH: Zara-owner Inditex said that its sales jumped 11% in constant currency for the first half of the spring season between Feb. 1 and March 11, after the Spanish fashion giant surpassed main rival H&M's annual sales growth https://t.co/CbYN5RHMP1 pic.twitter.com/pSDXmxChju

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024
